titles.title: Military and Federal Civilian Employee Pay Act
Making continuing appropriations for the compensation of Federal employees and certain military personnel in the event of a Government shutdown, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Oversight and Government Reform
